zones.name: Varrock
zones.description: A crumbling town built atop dimensional fault lines.

rooms.name: Varrock Square
rooms.description: The cobbled square pulses with unstable energy. A rift flickers in the distance.

rooms.name: Tower of Echoes
rooms.description: Runes float mid-air. You feel time shift with each breath.

zones.name: Western Forest
zones.description: Dark trees whisper forgotten languages. Eyes watch from the shadows.

rooms.name: Forest Edge
rooms.description: The edge of the forest is still, but tension hangs thick.

zones.name: Marcus's Pasture
zones.description: Marcus herds sheep. Something stirs beneath the soil.

rooms.name: Pasture Field
rooms.description: Sheep graze nervously. Marcus watches 'The Thing' move underfoot.
